A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was entertained the entire film. However\, it leaves too many unanswered questions when as Star Wars fans we should be getting answers to the questions. I thought I knew how the force worked but now I have no idea. Kylo Ren is all powerful darkside but yet struggles fighting Rey who is not trained in the force but yet he can take out some powerful people without them sensing what is happening?
